Description:
Best Location! Walk to Everything!
This fantastic fully renovated three bedrooms unit will appeal to both the first home buyers and the astute investors. Presenting a rare and perfect opportunity within walking distance to Westall Train Station, Westall Secondary College, Westall Primary School, minutes drive to Clayton Community Centre (with swimming pool and library), Clayton Central Shopping District, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and IKEA shopping centre.
This beautifully full renovated residence is comprised of huge living and dining area, separate modern kitchen, 3 large bedrooms with BIRs, modern central bathroom and 2 separate toilets, split system, as well as a huge private courtyard, perfect for children's play area entertaining family and friends.
Don't miss your chance and inspect today!

Description:
A LOVED & CARED FOR ORIGINAL BEAUTY
On a generous block in a quiet location, this home will surely appeal to first home buyers, investors, downsizers and those who might want something they can put their own stamp on with some cosmetic updates. Impressively maintained and largely original, this home hides nothing and shows its great condition with features including a spacious lounge with gas heater plus an adjoining meals area and pristine kitchen with gas cook top. There are 3 bedrooms with built in wardrobes as well as a family bathroom, semi-ensuite and a separate toilet. Outside, you can enjoy the great backyard and there's also a garage/workshop. Quietly positioned away from the noise and hustle, the home is still within minutes of buses and central Clayton with its shops, cafes and train station.

Description:
Best Location Ever! Land Size Approx 335m2
Excellent opportunity available for the first-home buyer or astute investor to secure this deluxe double storey residence situated within walking distance to Westall Secondary College, Westall Train Station, Bus stop, parklands, local shops, post office and only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre, Clayton Shopping District, Clayton Community Centre and IKEA Shopping Centre.
This architecturally designed townhouse with excellent craftsmanship throughout features ensuite to master bedroom, 2 large bedrooms with build-in-robes, spacious living area, study or second living area upstairs, modern bathrooms, kitchen with island stone benchtop, stainless-steel appliances, gas ducted heating, home security system, water tank and much, much more!
Easy access to your double lock up garage from your private outdoor area & low maintenance courtyard, makes this a perfect and practical design for your daily life, plus entertaining family and friends!
Look no further! This is what you have been dreaming of! Move right in to enjoy this fabulous lifestyle!

Description:
Calling all Developers and Investors
Plenty of choices with this decent sized block of land approximately 668sqm.
Renovate, develop (STCA), extend or build your dream home are the options that can be seriously considered with this property. Existing 3 bedroom brick veneer home needs tender loving care and comprises of 3 double bedrooms, lounge, dining, timber kitchen, laundry, central bathroom and toilet. Other features include tandem double garage with shelving, workbench and a shed.
This property is located in a very sought after area of Clayton South, only a short stroll to Westall train station and public transport.
Only minutes away from Monash University, Monash Hospital, Westall Secondary College, Clayton and Springvale shopping centre.
So please don't miss out on this unique opportunity for future development and investment - call today.

Description:
Perfect start and no body corporate fees! Under Contract.
This spacious 2 bedroom unit located within close proximity to all amenities will appeal to a wide variety of buyers! This fully renovated property with all quality fixtures and fittings and own street frontage comprising formal entry, spacious lounge/dining, 2 large bedrooms with built in robes, fully equiped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, huge family bathroom, single carport and a second car space, low maintenance courtyard.
Features:
*5 minutes walking distance to Train Station, schools and parks
* Close to Clayton Shops, Medical Centre, Monash University,
* Easy access to Monash Freeway
* Polished timber floors
* Split system air conditioning
* Gas heating and cooking
* Currently returning $1430 per month
For more information call me today!

Description:
FULLY RENOVATED UNIT - UNDER CONTRACT
Perfect Starter For Owner Occupier or Investor
This private, secure and spacious two bedroom rear unit offers much more than most comparable units in similar small developments. A complete make-over in 2010 and the addition of a fully fenced-off yard makes this property highly appealing to owner occupiers or tenants (currently generating a rental return of $18,200.00 p.a.) Situated on a good sized allotment, this neat and tidy property is packed with features including: open plan living/dining, separate kitchen area (modern dishwasher, gas cooking), ample storage space, a split-system air-conditioner, 2 car spaces, high security screen doors and polished floor boards. With quick access to bus services and minutes walk to train station, local shops, schools, community centres, parklands and more, this property ticks all the right boxes.

Description:
A Great Place To Call Home!
Start your family journey or your investment portfolio here. Offering substantial credentials as a first home or an investment property, this neat BV home offers prime positioning and updated appeal. Inside features a modern sky-lit kitchen with meals and timber floors, adjoining L-shaped lounge, 3 zoned bedrooms, central family bathroom, separate laundry & toilet. Ducted heating & dishwasher provide further modern comforts. Outside, a covered entertaining area, large paved low maintenance garden & double garage complete the package. Situated moments from Bourke Roads thriving shopping district, with easy transport options & access to a choice of schools. Land: 548sqm approx
Chris Karantzas : 0413 944 034

Description:
Attention Builders and Developers, Buy One or Buy Two!
Excellent opportunity for home buyers or astute investors to secure this spacious family home on a huge block. Positioned excellently from an investment perspective, these ideally located allotments with the potential to construct multi-unit townhouses (S.T.C.A) with bus stop right at your doorstep, walking distance from Westall Train Station, Westall Secondary College, Westall Primary School, minutes drive to Clayton Community Centre (with swimming pool and library), Clayton Train Station, Clayton Central Shopping District, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, Chadstone Shopping Centre and IKEA Shopping Centre.
Features: Three spacious bedrooms, central bathroom, updated kitchen with electric stove and oven, gas heaters, gas hot water system, 4 large living areas include separate lounge room, sitting room, dining area and family room plus study, separate laundry area, workshop with storage in the rear, all set on a massive double blocks of land of 885sqm each (Total Land Size: Approx 1770m2).
With an enormous location and land size, this property would be your best investment for years to come!
Inspect now before it is too late!

Description:
EXECUTIVE STYLE & CONVENIENCE IN A FAMILY SIZED PACKAGE
Just over 1 year old, this stunning executive rear townhouse has been so beautifully built and finished it begs the question - why would you bother building yourself? With plenty of space for a growing family all you need to do is move in, relax and enjoy great features including a generous living/dining area with timber flooring and stack sliding doors that open to a private courtyard and entertaining deck. The kitchen is a stylish and practical place to prepare a feast with stone benches, glass splashbacks and a full complement of Blanco stainless appliances. There are 4 robed bedrooms too including the ground floor master suite that has a walk in wardrobe and a porcelain tiled ensuite with frameless glass shower that matches the family bathroom upstairs. Additional features include a downstairs powder room, full laundry, video intercom, a double garage with remote door and internal access plus the added comfort of split system heater/air conditioners in the living area and all bedrooms. Close to local strip shops and buses the home is also within minutes of Central Clayton's shops, cafes and train station.
Insights: 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
The Development Of A Lifetime! Buy One or Buy Both Blocks!
Attention builders, investors and developers! Positioned excellently from an investment perspective, these ideally located allotments with the potential to construct multi-unit townhouses (S.T.C.A) with bus stop right at your doorstep, walking distance from Westall Train Station, Westall Secondary College, Westall Primary School, minutes drive to Clayton Community Centre (with swimming pool and library), Clayton Train Station, Clayton Central Shopping District, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, Chadstone Shopping Centre and IKEA Shopping Centre.
Features: Three spacious bedrooms, central bathroom, updated kitchen with electric stove and oven, gas heaters, gas hot water system, 4 large living areas include separate lounge room, sitting room, dining area and family room plus study, separate laundry area, workshop with storage in the rear, all set on a massive double blocks of land of 885sqm each (Total Land Size: Approx 1770m2).
With an enormous location and land size, this property would be your best investment for years to come!
Inspect now before it is too late!

MAKE THIS YOURS!
Positioned perfectly in a highly demanded area of Clayton South, this unique residence is ideal for the prudent investor or home owner. Tucked away in the Springvalley Estate, there is no doubt that this is one of a kind, comprising of:
- 3 bedrooms all with BIR
- Master w/ full ensuite, 2 bathrooms in total
- Spacious L-shaped lounge

- Double garage, Double Carport with additional car accommodation
With its own reserve just moments away, this corner block allotment offers both privacy and space. You will be delighted by the serenity being only moments away from Springvale Central, Clayton, Monash University, Westall Station, local primary & secondary schools and public transport. Get your foot in the door before it is too late!

Description:
A SURPRISINGLY SPACIOUS 2 BEDROOM UNIT
Tucked neatly at the rear of a well maintained block this unit offers plenty for first home buyers and investors where a low maintenance style of home is becoming increasingly popular. Surprisingly spacious, it features polished hardwood floors throughout, a generous living/dining area and a beautiful renovated kitchen with stone benches, porcelain tiled splash backs and stainless cooking appliances. Both bedrooms feature built in wardrobes and there's also a dual entry bathroom offering ensuite style access from the main bedroom. Extras include a gas heating, split system air conditioning, full laundry, single garage and a courtyard that is both private and easy to maintain. Well positioned with buses out the front, the home is within minutes of Clarinda Shopping Centre as well as central Clayton's shops, cafes and train station.

Description:
***UNDER OFFER***
Ready to move straight into, this immaculate one owner BV residence offers comfortable accommodation as is, while providing plenty of scope for future development. Offering huge lounge, separate dining room, 2 bedrooms with BIR's, a spacious kitchen with meals area & central tiled bathroom with separate shower, and separate laundry. For land lovers, the deep West facing garden will hold appeal and provides options to extend, or subdivide. A current Town Planning permit for a single storey unit to be constructed at the rear will be also be handed over to the lucky buyer. Positioned in a rapidly growing area, with great access to parks, train station, Monash Uni & Hospital, and Clayton Roads thriving shopping strip. Land:15.37m x 45.64m (700sqm) approx.
Chris Karantzas : 0413 944 034

Description:
Start Your Journey Here!
Set within the highly desired pocket of Clayton South, this lovely brick veneer beauty is sure to get first home owners/ investor heart's pumping. Providing convenience and desirable lifestyle living, the home comprises of:
- 3 bedrooms all w/ Built in robes
- Spacious Lounge room
- Kitchen and adjoining meals area
- Central Bathroom with Separate Toilet
- Massive Brick fronted Garage
- Security Shutters and much more
Positioned in a quiet court, within short travel distance to Westall Train station, Springvale Shops, Clayton Central, primary & secondary schools, it will sure provide a superb way of life. Quiet neighbours and surroundings offer the perfect platform to raise a family and enjoy a tranquil setting.
Call today before it's gone!

Description:
DECEASED ESTATE
In impressive and largely original condition, this home might have looks set well into the 1970's, but if you roll up your sleeves, you could give this home a cosmetic makeover, it could be a standout once more. In a court like position on around 600sqm, the home is fronted by comprehensive gardens for added privacy and inside you find a generous entrance hall leading you to the large lounge that is complemented by a gas equipped kitchen and meals area. There are 3 bedrooms with built in wardrobes, a family bathroom and toilet plus the added comfort of ducted heating and an additional gas heater. Outside there's a single garage and a generous backyard offering plenty of potential for play, relaxing and entertaining. As good as the home is some might choose to start from scratch and build the dream home they have always pictured for their family (STCA). No matter what you choose to do, the home will always be well positioned just minutes away from 3 primary schools, Namatjira Park and buses with central Clayton's shops and trains just minutes away.

Description:
Convenient Location, Corner Block, Must be Sold!
You will not find a more convenient location at this entry level price. Within minutes walk to Westall Primary/Secondary College/Train Station and moments from Springvale Shopping Centre makes this an ideal site for your dream home or build 2 townhouses side by side (STCA).
The home is in original condition and can be rented out while your plan is with the council or knock it down and build your 40 plus squares home in a location that is family friendly and will continue to experience strong growth.
Don't miss your opportunity to grab a bargain so bring your bids on Auction day (Deceased Estate must be sold)!!!
Features:
2 bedrooms with BIR's
Sun room/possible 3rd Bedroom
Separate Lounge/Dining
Landsize 590m2 approx (18.5m Frontage)
